train = pd.read_csv("../input/commonlitreadabilityprize/train.csv", nrows=None)
test = pd.read_csv("../input/commonlitreadabilityprize//test.csv", nrows=None)
train_aug = pd.read_csv("../input/commonlit-word-augmented-data/train_word_augmented.csv", nrows=None)
test_aug = pd.read_csv("../input/commonlit-word-augmented-data/test_word_augmented.csv", nrows=None)
source.fa237c3b:
additional_train = train_aug[['id','aug_excerpt','target','standard_error']].sample(random_state=1326, frac=.7)
additional_train.columns = ['id','excerpt','target','standard_error']
train_df = pd.concat([train, additional_train])
print(">> Original rows at top of dataframe")
display(train_df.head())
print(">> Concated augmented rows")
display(train_df.tail())
